      • exit

        public void exit(boolean force)
        Description copied from interface: ServiceBaseInterface
        Closes service-server by ending all client requests if 'exit process' is not forced.
        Parameters:
        force - If set true service is closed forcefully, and If set false service is closed gracefully.
